description: Order of complex Clifford group of degree 2^n arising in quantum coding theory.
references: B. Runge, Codes and Siegel modular forms, Discrete Math. 148 (1996), 175-204.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20
A. R. Calderbank, E. M. Rains, P. W. Shor and N. J. A. Sloane, Quantum error correction via codes over GF(4), IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory, 44 (1998), 1369-1387.
G. Nebe, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The invariants of the Clifford groups, Des. Codes Crypt. 24 (2001), 99-121.
G. Nebe, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, Self-Dual Codes and Invariant Theory, Springer, Berlin, 2006.
Index entries for sequences related to groups
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Peter Shor_
